lexUnit.name: disappointing.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: failing to fufill expectation, desires and hopes

sentence.text: Beset by illness -- with Gooch himself the most damaging victim of the last few weeks -- and bemused by Indian spin , England must pull themselves together if a bitterly disappointing tour is not to become a total disaster .
It was a beautiful afternoon , warmer than most in the past disappointing summer .
He described his performance at Muirfield last July when he missed the halfway cut as ` the most disappointing point of my year . "

A goal from Cliftonville striker Ron Manley in the first half was enough to settle this most disappointing affair ; the only consolation for Linfield is that they 're already through to the quarter-finals .
The most disappointing aspect of this matter is that he should have seen fit to introduce politics into licensing board affairs .
In view of the rather disappointing number of entries for this substantial prize the committee is reconsidering whether to run the competition in the same format again this year .

After the rather disappointing end to his adventures in Italy , Wolfgang once more devoted himself to composition -- more symphonies , divertimentos for wind instruments , Masses , and a double violin concerto .
The event has a rather disappointing entry this year with a number of players choosing to play in the York Rosebowl at Strensall golf club , their scratch event .
THE RAE Symphony Orchestra 's all Russian programme drew a somewhat disappointing audience in the RAE Assembly Hall .

In fifth it 's no faster , and given that Mercedes reckons it should reach 143mph , this is a disappointing result .

From their point of view the results are rather disappointing .
When I meet them again it is so disappointing because I have changed so much , and they have changed so much , so it 's completely worthless . "
Their attitude was very disappointing .
Everyone went away thoroughly entertained , but it was a very disappointing result as far as we are concerned . "
Let's just say it was a disappointing result . "
The graduate assignments the following year were reportedly very disappointing , with a disproportionate number being sent to rural areas .
Its most obvious difficulties have been lack of scale and disappointing growth .
The response was rather disappointing but at least 40% of the forms were returned thus allowing the scheme to go forward .
“ It was a very sad and disappointing night , ” said Taylor .
A MORE direct and purposeful Erith and Belvedere side deservedly took the Beazer Homes Southern Division points at Cressing Road as Braintree failed once again with another disappointing display .
I can offer little in the way of explanation for our disappointing display , although the failure of goalkeeper John Slack to turn up severely crippled the team .
Liberal Democrats recognise that if we are to improve Britain 's disappointing economic performance we have to change the governmental system which produces it .
Jemson 's problems should n't detract from woeful Wednesday 's own troubles and their disappointing performance .
` We 've taken a bit of stick and rightly so because we 've had a bad week and had two disappointing performances .
As mentioned earlier , scales can sometimes show disappointing results because of fluid fluctuations within the body .
Empirically derived combinations of chemotherapeutic drugs have given disappointing results .

I do nt subscribe to get lots of Leeds bashing each and every time we have a disappointing result .
CRYSTAL PALACE manager Steve Coppell last night courageously accepted full responsibility for the club 's disappointing start to the season .
` After such a disappointing season it 's great to be involved in a semi-final .
The horse has had a disappointing season after having won the Racing Post Stakes as a two-year-old and looking like a “ good thing ” for even one of the Derbys .
But Seaman , one of those criticised in the shock reverse by Norwich , said : ` We 've had a disappointing start but we are hoping to get off the bottom against Liverpool .
After a disappointing start , the week should bring action , adventure , opportunity , excitement , progress and triumph .
Cricket now , and the quarter finals of the Nat West trophy , Northants have made a disappointing start .
GRIM Reaper Robin Reid 's road to boxing glory ended yesterday with a disappointing 8-3 points defeat in the semi-finals , writes Mike Langley .

Unfortunately , this deeply disappointing book is not it .
This score is so inspired and obviously such a pleasure to play that it never seems to receive a really disappointing recording .
Arjuna Ranatunga has been reappointed as Sri Lanka 's captain , replacing Aravinda de Silva after a disappointing World Cup campaign .
MERSEYSIDE hockey clubs had another disappointing weekend in the National League .
After a disappointing December when sales fell by 1.0 per cent , the volume of sales jumped 1.6 per cent between December and January , according to figures from the Central Statistical Office .
